title: Integrated Logistic Park shall be allowed in Commercial, Industrial and Agricultural Zone in Development Plan and Regional Plan areas and shall be governed by the provisions mentioned herein below
clause_text: Integrated Logistic Park shall be allowed in Commercial, Industrial and Agricultural Zone in Development Plan and Regional Plan areas and shall be governed by the provisions mentioned herein below.
